resources.string: No voice input model installed for %s, tap to check options?
Please go to Permissions, and enable Microphone permission to use voice input
There are no items to clear. Disable clipboard history?
There are no unpinned items to clear. Unpin all items?
Please unlock your device to access clipboard history
The clipboard history could not be saved or loaded. It may be corrupted. You can try deleting it, or restarting the keyboard. Please report this as a bug. Reason: %1$s
Delete the clipboard? ALL items will be lost.
To save clipboard items, you can enable clipboard history. This will keep up to %1$s items for %2$s days (pinned items are exempt). You can configure this in settings.
App does not support image insertion
Number of unpinned clips to keep
If enabled, it will save items from password managers, incognito windows, etc
Use vertical list layout instead of grid
Show recently copied text in suggestion bar
App may not support image insertion, this feature may not work.
An update is available (%s). Tap to download
Blacklist the word \"%s\" from being suggested?
Please tap to check for updates, or check in settings
No dictionary installed, tap to download?
You\'ve been using FUTO Keyboard for %d days. If you find this app useful, please consider paying to support future development of FUTO software.
Thank you for trying out FUTO Keyboard! If you find this app useful, please consider paying to support future development of FUTO software.
FUTO is dedicated to making good software that doesn\'t abuse you. This app will never serve you ads or collect your personal data.

FUTO\'s mission is for open-source software and non-malicious software business practices to become a sustainable income source for projects and their developers. For this reason, we are in favor of users actually paying for software.
This app will never serve you ads or sell your data. We are not in the business of doing that.
Payment is unsupported on this build
If you already paid for FUTO Keyboard or FUTO Voice Input, tap below.
Are you sure you want to confirm you already paid? Once confirmed, you won\'t be asked about paying again.
This will hide the reminder in the settings screen for the period of days entered.
When would you like to be reminded?
Thank you for purchasing FUTO Keyboard!
Your purchase will help continued development of FUTO Keyboard, and other FUTO projects.
Your payment is still pending, but it should clear soon.
If you just paid, your payment may still be processing, you should get an email with more information.
Unfortunately, your payment has failed for one reason or another. Please contact us if you need help. You can reach us at keyboard@futo.org, with the button below, or with Send Feedback in Help

There may have been a problem with your payment. If it did go through, you should receive an email with a license key. Please contact us if you need help. You can reach us at keyboard@futo.org, with the button below, or with Share Feedback at the main screen.
Failed to verify license. If you believe this to be an error, please contact us.
Thank you for using the paid version of FUTO Keyboard!
This app doesn\'t connect to the internet and it won\'t be able to check for automatic updates. You can check for updates manually though.
Please use F-Droid or Obtainium for automatic updates. Visit keyboard.futo.org for download options.
You are on the development build of FUTO Keyboard. Visit keyboard.futo.org if you want to download the stable build.
Option is disabled as it depends on another option, tap to visit menu: %1$s
This language has no built-in dictionary. We recommend downloading and importing one to get autocorrect and word suggestions.
View languages you’ve enabled, remove languages, change or add additional layouts, or toggle multilingual typing
Would you like to revert the voice input model to default, or replace it with another file?
No built-in voice input model exists for this language, so if you remove it, voice input will stop working for this language until you import a different model!
You have not configured a custom voice input model for this language. You can explore downloads online, or import one from a file.
Would you like to revert the transformer model to default, or replace it with another file?
No built-in transformer model exists for this language, so if you remove it, transformer-based predictions will stop working for this language until you import a different model!
You have not configured a custom transformer model for this language. You can explore downloads online, or import one from a file.
Would you like to revert the dictionary to default, or replace it with another file?
No built-in dictionary exists for this language, so if you remove it, autocorrect and predictions will stop working for this language until you import a different dictionary!
You have not configured a custom dictionary for this language. You can explore downloads online, or import one from a file.
Remove %1$s, all of its associated layouts and custom resources?
Error: This file appears to be a source wordlist (_wordlist.combined) instead of a compiled dictionary (.dict) file.
Please download the compiled dictionary file, not the wordlist. If you made this wordlist yourself, compile it externally using dicttool.
Error: This file could not be recognized. It may be invalid or it may have been corrupted. Try re-downloading it, or try a different file.
Importing configuration… Please do not close this menu until the process is completed (5 to 10 seconds)
Select the language to import for:
This file appears to be intended for a language (%1$s) which is not enabled in settings

Are you sure you want to import this configuration backup? This will replace all of your settings, personal dictionary (system-wide), learned dictionary words, any imported resources, and more. If you’re unsure, make another backup before this.
This configuration backup was created by a newer version of FUTO Keyboard, and it might not import properly. Try updating FUTO Keyboard first.
Back up all of your settings, clipboard, learned words, resources, and more.
Please do not close this menu until the process is completed (5 to 10 seconds)
If you previously exported your config, you can re-import it here.
backup, restore, save, load, export, import, transfer device
Edit favorite actions, pinned actions, and the action key next to the spacebar
Please assign only one action key. You cannot assign more than one action to the action key.
Please consider pinning fewer actions. The suggestion bar will need to be shrunk to accommodate this many actions.
Show a key to the left of spacebar to quickly access an action. Enabling this will place an emoji key, but it can be customized in “Edit Actions“
Show a key to the left of spacebar to quickly access an action. Disabling this will move the currently assigned action: %s
Replace the emoji key with a language switch key. Go to “Edit Actions” to put something else.
Change keyboard size, make it one-handed, floating, split
Tap the \"Resize Keyboard\" button to resize.
You can access this anywhere with the Keyboard Modes action:
Size and mode is stored separately for portrait and landscape.
Tap to reset all sizes and modes for both portrait and landscape to default
Configure long-press duration, how to order letters/symbols, and behavior of spacebar and delete key.
Display a small hint on each key, showing the primary long-press key
additional characters, alt keys, symbols, popup keys
How long a key needs to be pressed to be considered a long-press
Backspace Behavior when holding or swiping
Swiping moves cursor, long-pressing switches language
Swiping changes language, long-pressing moves cursor
Swiping and long-pressing only moves cursor
e.g. [ß] on [s] in all Latin script languages
Allow swiping from key to key to write words.
The volume setting may have no effect on some versions of Android.
The sound will not play if your ringer mode is set to silent or vibrate.
When active, the number row is shown on top of the keyboard on supported layouts
When active, the arrow keys row is shown on the bottom of the keyboard
Configure additional layouts in the languages screen
Show the bar containing suggestions. Recommended to keep enabled
Display password manager autofill and auto-reply suggestions (provided by app) in suggestion bar
Replaces the layout of long-pressed period key with a flickable layout: ! , . ?
Drag or pinch to adjust image
Use voice input provided by external app
Play a short sound on start and cancel
Display additional information, such as mic being used
Whether or not to use the personal dictionary for voice input
There may be extra delay to recording starting as Bluetooth SCO connection must be negotiated
Pause videos/music when voice input is activated
Prevent voice input from outputting symbols
If disabled, voice input will auto-stop after 30 seconds.
Automatically stop when silence is detected. You may need to manually stop regardless if there\'s too much background noise.
To change the models, visit Languages & Models menu
May kill your battery if enabled! This feature is pending more work
Note: Transformer LM is in alpha state
These settings are experimental and only relevant for English. These settings have no effect for other languages.
Uses dictionary to determine relevant next keys, and boosts their hit area. Boosting is avoided after a backspace
Click here to view the list of blacklisted suggestions, add or remove entries
We want to hear from you! If you\'re reporting an issue, your version may be relevant: v%1$s
Learn more about us and our philosophy
Learn more about the keyboard\'s features and capabilities
Wanna talk but don\'t like Zulip? Chat here
Wanna talk but don\'t like Discord? Chat here
Specific bug or feature request? Post here
Private feedback, help, or don\'t use GitHub? Email us
gmail, support, contact, help, broken, bug, error, issue, problem, complaint, ticket, payment, support, glitch, malfunction, fix, customer service, crash, question, inquiry, assistance

Welcome to FUTO Keyboard (alpha)! This product is still under development and not yet finished, we appreciate your patience and understanding.\n\nTo get started, enable FUTO Keyboard as an input method.
Warning: You seem to have both Play Store and Standalone versions installed, we only recommend installing one
Please select FUTO Keyboard as your active input method.
Thanks to these people for helping make FUTO Keyboard a great app!
The authors listed above are not affiliated with us, and may not necessarily endorse or promote us. Listing does not imply affiliation or endorsement.
Disables cycling between vowels on repeated key presses (Keitai input)

Options below are experimental and may be removed or changed in the future as internal workings of the app change. Changing these values may have an adverse impact on your experience.
Note: These only affect English
Lower value will make autocorrect behave more similarly to standard AOSP keyboard, while higher value will make it more dependent on the neural network Default is %1$s
A lower threshold will autocorrect more often (and miscorrect more often), while a higher threshold will autocorrect less often (and miscorrect less often). Default is %1$s
Error: Shortcut may not start with symbol
